name: smartpulver-api
description: SmartPulver Multi-tenant API with modular architecture

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd ../lambda-deployment && zip -r ../modular-lambda.zip . && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name api-lambda --zip-file fileb://modular-lambda.zip --region sa-east-1

author: SmartPulver Team
